page.title: 06A POEM OF CROFTING LIFE
page.content:
A YEAR ON WIR CROFT VOAR IS A LIGHTSOME TIME O YEAR,WHIN BIRDS START TWEETIN,AN LAMBS START BLEATIN,WIR GRUND IS AA DELLED,WIR CROPS IR AA IN,DOON ON WIR CROFT AT MINN.WIR BISY IN HAIRST DELLIN UP AA WIR CROPS,GETTIN IN AA WIR HAY,AN SELLIN WIR LAMBS,AN CLIPPIN AN DIPPIN DOON ON WIR CROFT AT MINN.
A YEAR ON OUR CROFT SPRING IS A LIGHTSOME TIME OF YEAR,WHEN BIRDS START TWEETING,AND LAMBS START BLEATING,OUR GROUND IS ALL TILLED,OUR CROPS ARE ALL IN,DOWN ON OUR CROFT AT MINN.WE ARE BUSY IN AUTUMN TILLING UP ALL OUR CROPS,GETTING IN ALL OUR HAY,AND SELLING OUR LAMBS,AND CLIPPING AND DIPPING,DOWN ON OUR CROFT AT MINN.
